report.title: Trance Trip
report.author: Human
report.bodytext: Woke up at 2pm. /n /n 3pm: Ate 2 ham and turkey sandwiches for lunch. /n /n (With 4 of my friends) /n /n 9pm: We took Foxy pill, along with 2 tabs of PepmoBismal. /n smoker/ foxy Female: 120-lbs /n only foxy Female: 135-lbs /n only foxy Female: 100-lbs /n smoker/ foxy Male: 165-lbs /n /n 9:45pm: Setting: Room with candles. 2 big beds on the floor and a kitty cat chilling with us. /n /n Played some Tool on the stereo. We three smoked 5 bowls of regs. only foxy female 100-lbs started tripping, pretty much overwhelmed. /n /n I felt nothing. /n /n 10pm: Completely stoned and zoned out. /n /n Starting to feel jittery and very happy. Not with energy, just in my mood. Everyone (but *only foxy female 100-lbs) is feeling pretty good right now. /n /n Switched music to trance and turned it up. Killed the candles and turned on the blacklight with glow in the dark paint on ceiling. /n /n 11pm: I feel like I weigh 5 times more than I do. Im laying sunken on my bed, like a big blob. My body feels excellent. Pretty numb and twitchy. My jaw feels really tired. /n /n Visually blurred out, glowing green paint on ceiling is moving. Visuals of rich texture and bright glow to certain things in the room. /n /n *Being high as the 5-MeO-DiPT worked into my system was great because it creped up on me nicely while I was stoned. /n /n 12am: The foxy is flowing like waves off and on. Everyone is still planted into the bed. Some small talk every once in a while, mostly people checking up each other. Giggles all over the room spreading from one person to another like dropping dominos. /n /n The trance was very soothing and rideable as we flowed through our frozen dreams. /n /n Closed eye visuals were incredible. Kaleidoscope of craziness, mostly unimaginable or indescribable. /n /n only foxy female 100-lbs is feeling good now. /n /n Stomach discomfort is beginning to be noticeable. /n /n 4am: Coming down nicely. Only a little bit agitated and with some stomach growling. /n /n 5am: Finally my mind has stopped spinning and thinking. Sleep. /n /n My overall experience was wonderful. As a psychedelic experience and mind journey I would say I didnt travel that far. The up and down of foxy and the lack of focus, made my thoughts start to develop but never finish. Mentally I ended right were I started. Now I just feel fresh and motivated. During the night I pretty much indulged in my body more than my mind. Focusing on relaxing and feeling things.
